reviewText: Movie is awesome, saw it on Netflix in 3D and it blew me away. This seller however, sells a non-US version and it did not work and did not say so in the description. Thankfully Amazon made it right as always.

HONESTLY: Greatest sports film ever made!!! Viewers will be treated to unforgettable scenic images, a hypnotic soundtrack & the best **in your face** snowboarding action ever captured. Inspirational, cool & hip.. its so much fun! To watch this in 3D is to experience Real Cinema in all its Grandeur. The Sum? This film is Perfect. The cost? Ecstasy for your soul. Spread the word.
